Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies are fresh off an exciting series win over the Atlanta Braves.
The New York Mets have won three of their last four games, including a series win over Miami.
The Phillies enter the series with thoughts of clinching a postseason berth at home.
The Phillies currently lead the NL Wild Card standings at +4.0 games.
If the postseason began today, the Phillies would host Arizona in the three-game National League Wild Card Series from Citizens Bank Park.
